name: Gali & the Snails Invaders
description:
Gali & the snails invaders is our first videogame created with unity. a platformer where you fight hordes of snails with legs and UFOs steal hearts.

Synopsis: 

One night, Gali was dreaming that she was walking through a dark forest, when a voice that claimed to be from God told her: "The time of the apocalypse has come, I am going to destroy humanity and cleanse the world of evil, I will send my Angels and those will turn humans into beings that reflect their inner evil. But since you are a being with a pure heart, my punishment will not fall on you".

Gali did not understand anything that the voice told her, and when she woke up she noticed how some UFOs transformed people into snails with legs.

Gali found it funny how snails can hide in their shells and kick each other like a ball.

So Gali started a journey to find the cause of this incident... and kick some snails along the way.

controls:

arrows: move

z: jump.

x: catch/throw shell.

up arrow: throw shell up.

down arrow: get off ropes, throw shell down.

creator's note: this is version 0.9, the game is practically complete, but there are still some details that I want to add, besides that they may have some bugs and failures to correct.

The game was created by a team consisting of only one member, who is currently somewhat busy with classes at the university. As I get free, I will update the game.
